info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:28AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie County through 300 AM EDT... At 228 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Mocksville, or 4 miles west of Bermuda Run, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Fork Church, Advance and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
